statements: UPDATE fraudulent_transactions SET amount = 100.50 WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE fraudulent_transactions SET merchant_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002', user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174003' WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174004';

UPDATE transactions SET amount = 100.50 WHERE transaction_id = 1;
UPDATE machine_learning_models SET accuracy = 0.95 WHERE model_id = 10;
UPDATE transactions SET is_fraud = TRUE WHERE transaction_id = 3;

UPDATE transactions SET is_fraud = true WHERE amount > 1000;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 150.50 WHERE transaction_id = 'c7f5b8d7-7047-48d8-86b9-73308fac9a6d';

UPDATE transactions SET amount = 100.50 WHERE transaction_id = '1111-2222-3333-4444';
UPDATE users SET email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id = '5555-6666-7777-8888';
UPDATE models SET model_accuracy = 0.95 WHERE model_id = '9999-0000-1111-2222';

UPDATE predictions SET confidence = confidence + 0.05 WHERE model_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'

UPDATE customer_details SET customer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE customer_id = 5678;
